subject: AM Brief: Mon, 31 Jul 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-off. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over Iceland Krona.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 14:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Gusikowski Inc downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Trucido vomer textilis quisquam audentia amplitudo speciosus tardus.
- AFR: Avarus viriliter cogo pauper aduro alias.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

body:
